00025     KTEventWindowFunction::KTEventWindowFunction() :
00026             KTWindowFunction(),
00027             fWindowFunction(new TArrayD(1)),
00028             fLength(1.),
00029             fBinWidth(1.),
00030             fSize(1)
00031     {
00032     }
00033 
00034     KTEventWindowFunction::KTEventWindowFunction(const KTEvent* event) :
00035                     KTWindowFunction(),
00036                     fWindowFunction(new TArrayD(1)),
00037                     fLength(1.),
00038                     fBinWidth(event->GetBinWidth()),
00039                     fSize(1)
00040     {
00041         fSize = TMath::Nint(fLength / fBinWidth);
00042         fLength = (Double_t)fSize * fBinWidth;
00043     }
00044 
00045     KTEventWindowFunction::~KTEventWindowFunction()
00046     {
00047         delete fWindowFunction;
00048     }

00050     Double_t KTEventWindowFunction::AdaptTo(const KTEvent* event)
00051     {
00052         return this->SetBinWidth(event->GetBinWidth());
00053     }
00054 
00055     Double_t KTEventWindowFunction::AdaptTo(const KTEvent* event, Double_t length)
00056     {
00057         return this->SetBinWidthAndLength(event->GetBinWidth(), length);
00058     }

00060     TH1D* KTEventWindowFunction::CreateHistogram() const
00061     {
00062         Int_t sideBands = TMath::Nint(0.2 * fSize);
00063         Int_t totalSize = fSize + 2 * sideBands;
00064         Double_t histEdges = fLength / 2. + sideBands * fBinWidth;
00065         TH1D* hist = new TH1D("hWindowFunction", "Window Function", totalSize, -histEdges, histEdges);
00066         for (Int_t iHistBin=1; iHistBin<=sideBands; iHistBin++)
00067         {
00068             hist->SetBinContent(iHistBin, 0.);
00069             hist->SetBinContent(totalSize-iHistBin+1, 0.);
00070         }
00071         for (Int_t iHistBin=sideBands+1; iHistBin<=fSize+sideBands; iHistBin++)
00072         {
00073             hist->SetBinContent(iHistBin, this->GetWeight(iHistBin-sideBands-1));
00074         }
00075         hist->SetYTitle("Weight");
00076         return hist;
00077     }
00078 
00079     TH1D* KTEventWindowFunction::CreateFrequencyResponseHistogram() const
00080     {
00081         Int_t sideBands = TMath::Nint(0.2 * fSize);
00082         Int_t totalSize = fSize + 2 * sideBands;
00083         TArrayD* timeData = new TArrayD(totalSize);
00084         for (Int_t iBin=0; iBin<sideBands; iBin++)
00085         {
00086             (*timeData)[iBin] = 0.;
00087             (*timeData)[totalSize-iBin-1] = 0.;
00088         }
00089         for (Int_t iBin=sideBands; iBin<fSize+sideBands; iBin++)
00090         {
00091             (*timeData)[iBin] = this->GetWeight(iBin-sideBands);
00092         }
00093         KTSimpleFFT* fft = new KTSimpleFFT(totalSize);
00094         fft->SetFreqBinWidth(fBinWidth);
00095         fft->SetTransformFlag("ES");
00096         fft->InitializeFFT();
00097         fft->TakeData((TArray*)timeData);
00098         fft->Transform();
00099         KTPowerSpectrum* ps = fft->CreatePowerSpectrum();
00100         delete timeData;
00101         delete fft;
00102         TH1D* hist = ps->CreateMagnitudeHistogram();
00103         hist->SetYTitle("Weight");
00104         delete ps;
00105         return hist;
00106     }

00123     Double_t KTEventWindowFunction::SetLength(Double_t length)
00124     {
00125         Double_t prelimNBins = length / fBinWidth;
00126         fSize = TMath::Nint(prelimNBins);
00127         fLength = (Double_t)fSize * fBinWidth;
00128         this->RebuildWindowFunction();
00129         return fLength;
00130     }
00131 
00132     Double_t KTEventWindowFunction::SetBinWidth(Double_t bw)
00133     {
00134         fBinWidth = bw;
00135         Double_t prelimNBins = fLength / fBinWidth;
00136         fSize = TMath::Nint(prelimNBins);
00137         fLength = (Double_t)fSize * fBinWidth;
00138         this->RebuildWindowFunction();
00139         return fLength;
00140     }
00141 
00142     Double_t KTEventWindowFunction::SetBinWidthAndLength(Double_t bw, Double_t length)
00143     {
00144         fBinWidth = bw;
00145         Double_t prelimNBins = length / fBinWidth;
00146         fSize = TMath::Nint(prelimNBins);
00147         fLength = (Double_t)fSize * fBinWidth;
00148         this->RebuildWindowFunction();
00149         return fLength;
00150     }

00152     Double_t KTEventWindowFunction::SetSize(Int_t wib)
00153     {
00154         fSize = wib;
00155         fLength = (Double_t)fSize * fBinWidth;
00156         this->RebuildWindowFunction();
00157         return fLength;
